name: Dice Shot (Dackss)
description:
Dice shot is a small top-down shooter made for the GMTK game jam 2022. Fend of hordes of ghost while using the dice revolver, a special gun with ammo that is created at random by a 6-sided die. You must be quick on your feet and react to the random ammo, will you get lucky and get a super shot? Or will you gun jam leaving you defenselessness against approaching enemies?   

Controls

WASD to move

Space to dash

Left mouse to shoot

Right mouse to reload

Credits

kenney art assets (https://kenney.nl/assets?q=2d)

"8 Guns + Projectiles" art by King Kelpo (https://kingkelp.itch.io/8guns)

sound effects made with jsfxr (https://sfxr.me/)

soundtrack "retro forest" by David Fesliyan (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/retro-forest/451)
